explanation: [0-0] In the game Minecraft, a zombie stands on the grass holding a bow and arrow, facing left. In the distance behind it is a high mountain made of blocks.

[0-6] The camera zooms in as the zombie raises its bow and shoots an arrow to the left. The scene cuts to the arrow hitting the second ring of a target. The scene then cuts to an Evoker drawing its bow and shooting to the left. The scene cuts again, showing the arrow hitting within the first ring. The scene cuts once more to a Skeleton rapidly firing two arrows to the left. The scene transitions to the target, revealing both arrows have hit the center.
